is a semi-private club that has a few amenities open to the public (such as dining & golf) and many more amenities reserved for Club Members.  Offering competitively priced social, golf, racquets (tennis & pickleball) and fitness memberships.

Play
Membership Overview
Boca Royale Golf & Country Club
is a semi-private club that has a few amenities open to the public (such as dining & golf) and many more amenities reserved for Club Members.  Offering competitively priced  golf,  & racquets (tennis & pickleball) memberships.
Members at
Boca Royale Golf & Country Club
not only enjoy exceptional golf, racquets (tennis & pickleball) & fitness facilities, but they also appreciate the casual and friendly atmosphere at Boca Royale and actively participate in social activities throughout the year. From theme parties, bingo, and trivia to car shows, drive-in movie nights and wine dinners, the days at Boca Royale are filled with interesting things to do.
​We welcome new members at
Boca Royale Golf & Country Club
, so you never have to feel like you're not part of the crowd.  Do you want to know the kind of people who are members here?  The answer is, people just like you!  When you become a member at
Boca Royale Golf & Country Club
, you join a warm group of friends.
Click here to view our Quarterly Pineapple Press
For more information regarding Membership, Contact Membership Director,
Allie Lowery.
Golf Membership
Newly Renovated Golf Course
:
Redesigned in 2024 by Golf Course Architect Gordy Lewis.
Par 71 layout measuring just over 6,600 yards from the back tees.
Small greens with subtle undulations, large collection areas, and classic bunker designs reminiscent of traditional golf architecture.
Upgraded Features
:
Rebuilt bunkers with pristine white sand and new drainage for playability even after heavy rain.
Expanded tees spanning nearly 5 acres for a variety of playing challenges.
Grass: Seashore Paspalum Platinum TE, offering a world-class playing surface with deep green color and a dense canopy for ideal lies.
Aesthetic Enhancements
:
Coquina cart paths and waste areas create a striking contrast with the lush green grass.
Member Benefits
:
Access to the Men’s Golf Association (MGA), Women’s Golf Association (WGA), and Club-sponsored golf tournaments.
Priority tee times and ability to book 7 days in advance.
Discounts at the Pro Shop.
Six complimentary guest passes per year.
Option to walk the course trail.
Use of your own approved golf cart or the Club’s GPS-equipped carts.
Why Join at Boca Royale?
:
A must-play course with a design that appeals to players of all skill levels.
A perfect blend of challenge and beauty, making it a course you'll want to call home.
Racquets Membership
Racquets at Boca Royale Golf & Country Club
Facilities
:
Six Har-Tru clay courts, all illuminated for night play.
Eight pickleball courts, all illuminated for night play.
Conveniently located near the Clubhouse and golf practice area.
Membership Perks
:
Access to Racquets Events & Programs, Fitness Center & Social Membership to Clubhouse
Suitable for both beginners and seasoned players.
Programs & Instruction
:
Doubles clinics, drills, and league team practice.
Private lessons by appointment.
Year-round programs led by a full-time USPTA professional.
Tennis ball and pickleball machine rentals.
Community & Social Events
:
Monthly social mixers for tennis and pickleball.
Men's and Women's Leagues, Tri-Cities League, U.S.T.A., and U.S.A.P.A. Leagues.
Singles Leagues available.
Support
:
Friendly tennis and pickleball ambasadors available to facilitate play.
Why Boca Royale?
Premier racquets facility.
Vibrant community and unparalleled amenities.
Opportunities for skill development and enjoyment year-round.
Social Membership
Clubhouse & Community
:
Stunning Georgian clubhouse for dining and social activities.
Friendly, socially active Members with diverse interests.
Membership Options
:
Social memberships available for Boca Royale residents and surrounding community members.
Activities & Events
:
Variety of activities and events
Weekly groups for bridge, Mah-Jongg, and poker.
Service Excellence
:
Courteous, professional staff focused on creating memorable experiences for all Members.
Why Join?
:
Vibrant community that accommodates your interests.
Become part of the Boca Royale family today!
